entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Target Company for Project INUK. Financials presented are for this company.
entities.growthStrategySummary: Revenues are expected to reach almost €6.5m by FY24BP and grow at a CAGR of +24% over the projected period. The revenue mix should continue to switch towards additional recurring revenue, representing €5.3m by FY24BP (82% of total revenues). The Adjusted EBITDA margin is forecast to continue to improve up to 49% in FY24BP thanks to the favorable scaling effect.

keyInvestmentHighlights: Revenues expected to reach almost €6.5m by FY24BP
Revenue CAGR of +24% over the projected period (FY22L-FY24BP)
Revenue mix switching towards additional recurring revenue, representing €5.3m by FY24BP (82% of total revenues)
Adjusted EBITDA margin forecast to improve up to 49% in FY24BP due to favorable scaling effect
